SELECT bl.Id, bl.BoardId, bo.BoardKindId, bk.BoardName, bo.GroupId, bo.Nickname, bo.Title, bo.Content, bo.WriteDate, bo.`Status` FROM BookmarkList bl INNER JOIN Board bo ON bl.BoardId=bo.Id INNER JOIN BoardKind bk ON bk.Id = bo.BoardKindId WHERE bl.UserId='cksdud' ORDER BY Id DESC
